description: ff. 26. 178 x 130; 145 x 105 mm. 17 lin. 13th cen. - on fol. 25b-26b six samāʻ notes (the first three are copies); according to the fourth, the copyist Muḥammad ibn Salāmah ibn ʻUmar heard this juzʼ before ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Ruhāwī in Jumādá II, 610. Riwāyah of Abū Isḥāq Ibrāhīm ibn ʻUmar al-Barmakī. Incip.: ... الحمد لله .. اخبرنا الامام الحافظ ابو محمد عبد القادر ... اما بعد ىا اخوانى عصمنا الله واىاکم من غبلة الاهوا
author: Ibn Baṭṭah, ʻUbayd Allāh ibn Muḥammad, 917-997

title.@value: Juzʻ fīhi ittiḥād al-siqāyah wa-al-maṭāhir fī raḥbat al-masājid
